00016   void Output::fallback_impl(AST_Node* n)
00017   {
00018     return n->perform(this);

00021   void Output::operator()(Import* imp)
00022   {

00026   OutputBuffer Output::get_buffer(void)
00027   {
00028 
00029     Emitter emitter(ctx);
00030     Inspect inspect(emitter);
00031 
00032     size_t size_nodes = top_nodes.size();
00033     for (size_t i = 0; i < size_nodes; i++) {
00034       top_nodes[i]->perform(&inspect);
00035       inspect.append_mandatory_linefeed();
00036     }
00037 
00038     // flush scheduled outputs
00039     inspect.finalize();
00040     // prepend buffer on top
00041     prepend_output(inspect.output());
00042     // make sure we end with a linefeed
00043     if (!ends_with(wbuf.buffer, ctx->linefeed)) {
00044       // if the output is not completely empty
00045       if (!wbuf.buffer.empty()) append_string(ctx->linefeed);
00046     }
00047 
00048     // search for unicode char
00049     for(const char& chr : wbuf.buffer) {
00050       // skip all ascii chars
00051       if (chr >= 0) continue;
00052       // declare the charset
00053       if (output_style() != COMPRESSED)
00054         charset = "@charset \"UTF-8\";"
00055                   + ctx->linefeed;
00056       else charset = "\xEF\xBB\xBF";
00057       // abort search
00058       break;
00059     }
00060 
00061     // add charset as first line, before comments and imports
00062     if (!charset.empty()) prepend_string(charset);
00063 
00064     return wbuf;
00065 
00066   }

00068   void Output::operator()(Comment* c)
00069   {
00070     To_String to_string(ctx);
00071     string txt = c->text()->perform(&to_string);
00072     // if (indentation && txt == "/**/") return;
00073     bool important = c->is_important();
00074     if (output_style() != COMPRESSED || important) {
00075       if (buffer().size() == 0) {
00076         top_nodes.push_back(c);
00077       } else {
00078         in_comment = true;
00079         append_indentation();
00080         c->text()->perform(this);
00081         in_comment = false;
00082         if (indentation == 0) {
00083           append_mandatory_linefeed();
00084         } else {
00085           append_optional_linefeed();
00086         }
00087       }
00088     }
00089   }

00091   void Output::operator()(Ruleset* r)
00092   {
00093     Selector* s     = r->selector();
00094     Block*    b     = r->block();
00095     bool      decls = false;
00096 
00097     // Filter out rulesets that aren't printable (process its children though)
00098     if (!Util::isPrintable(r, output_style())) {
00099       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00100         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00101         if (dynamic_cast<Has_Block*>(stm)) {
00102           stm->perform(this);
00103         }
00104       }
00105       return;
00106     }
00107 
00108     if (b->has_non_hoistable()) {
00109       decls = true;
00110       if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation += r->tabs();
00111       if (ctx && ctx->source_comments) {
00112         stringstream ss;
00113         append_indentation();
00114         ss << "/* line " << r->pstate().line+1 << ", " << r->pstate().path << " */";
00115         append_string(ss.str());
00116         append_optional_linefeed();
00117       }
00118       s->perform(this);
00119       append_scope_opener(b);
00120       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00121         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00122         bool bPrintExpression = true;
00123         // Check print conditions
00124         if (typeid(*stm) == typeid(Declaration)) {
00125           Declaration* dec = static_cast<Declaration*>(stm);
00126           if (dec->value()->concrete_type() == Expression::STRING) {
00127             String_Constant* valConst = static_cast<String_Constant*>(dec->value());
00128             string val(valConst->value());
00129             if (dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(valConst)) {
00130               if (!valConst->quote_mark() && val.empty()) {
00131                 bPrintExpression = false;
00132               }
00133             }
00134           }
00135           else if (dec->value()->concrete_type() == Expression::LIST) {
00136             List* list = static_cast<List*>(dec->value());
00137             bool all_invisible = true;
00138             for (size_t list_i = 0, list_L = list->length(); list_i < list_L; ++list_i) {
00139               Expression* item = (*list)[list_i];
00140               if (!item->is_invisible()) all_invisible = false;
00141             }
00142             if (all_invisible) bPrintExpression = false;
00143           }
00144         }
00145         // Print if OK
00146         if (!stm->is_hoistable() && bPrintExpression) {
00147           stm->perform(this);
00148         }
00149       }
00150       if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation -= r->tabs();
00151       append_scope_closer(b);
00152     }
00153 
00154     if (b->has_hoistable()) {
00155       if (decls) ++indentation;
00156       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00157         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00158         if (stm->is_hoistable()) {
00159           stm->perform(this);
00160         }
00161       }
00162       if (decls) --indentation;
00163     }
00164   }

00166   void Output::operator()(Keyframe_Rule* r)
00167   {
00168     Block* b = r->block();
00169     Selector* v = r->selector();
00170 
00171     if (v) {
00172       v->perform(this);
00173     }
00174 
00175     if (!b) {
00176       append_colon_separator();
00177       return;
00178     }
00179 
00180     append_scope_opener();
00181     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00182       Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00183       if (!stm->is_hoistable()) {
00184         stm->perform(this);
00185         if (i < L - 1) append_special_linefeed();
00186       }
00187     }
00188 
00189     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00190       Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00191       if (stm->is_hoistable()) {
00192         stm->perform(this);
00193       }
00194     }
00195 
00196     append_scope_closer();
00197   }

00199   void Output::operator()(Feature_Block* f)
00200   {
00201     if (f->is_invisible()) return;
00202 
00203     Feature_Query* q    = f->feature_queries();
00204     Block* b            = f->block();
00205 
00206     // Filter out feature blocks that aren't printable (process its children though)
00207     if (!Util::isPrintable(f, output_style())) {
00208       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00209         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00210         if (dynamic_cast<Has_Block*>(stm)) {
00211           stm->perform(this);
00212         }
00213       }
00214       return;
00215     }
00216 
00217     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation += f->tabs();
00218     append_indentation();
00219     append_token("@supports", f);
00220     append_mandatory_space();
00221     q->perform(this);
00222     append_scope_opener();
00223 
00224     Selector* e = f->selector();
00225     if (e && b->has_non_hoistable()) {
00226       // JMA - hoisted, output the non-hoistable in a nested block, followed by the hoistable
00227       e->perform(this);
00228       append_scope_opener();
00229 
00230       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00231         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00232         if (!stm->is_hoistable()) {
00233           stm->perform(this);
00234         }
00235       }
00236 
00237       append_scope_closer();
00238 
00239       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00240         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00241         if (stm->is_hoistable()) {
00242           stm->perform(this);
00243         }
00244       }
00245     }
00246     else {
00247       // JMA - not hoisted, just output in order
00248       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00249         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00250         stm->perform(this);
00251         if (i < L - 1) append_special_linefeed();
00252       }
00253     }
00254 
00255     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation -= f->tabs();
00256 
00257     append_scope_closer();
00258 
00259   }

00261   void Output::operator()(Media_Block* m)
00262   {
00263     if (m->is_invisible()) return;
00264 
00265     List*  q     = m->media_queries();
00266     Block* b     = m->block();
00267 
00268     // Filter out media blocks that aren't printable (process its children though)
00269     if (!Util::isPrintable(m, output_style())) {
00270       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00271         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00272         if (dynamic_cast<Has_Block*>(stm)) {
00273           stm->perform(this);
00274         }
00275       }
00276       return;
00277     }
00278     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation += m->tabs();
00279     append_indentation();
00280     append_token("@media", m);
00281     append_mandatory_space();
00282     in_media_block = true;
00283     q->perform(this);
00284     in_media_block = false;
00285     append_scope_opener();
00286 
00287     Selector* e = m->selector();
00288     if (e && b->has_non_hoistable()) {
00289       // JMA - hoisted, output the non-hoistable in a nested block, followed by the hoistable
00290       e->perform(this);
00291       append_scope_opener();
00292 
00293       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00294         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00295         if (!stm->is_hoistable()) {
00296           stm->perform(this);
00297         }
00298       }
00299 
00300       append_scope_closer();
00301 
00302       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00303         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00304         if (stm->is_hoistable()) {
00305           stm->perform(this);
00306         }
00307       }
00308     }
00309     else {
00310       // JMA - not hoisted, just output in order
00311       for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00312         Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00313         stm->perform(this);
00314         if (i < L - 1) append_special_linefeed();
00315       }
00316     }
00317 
00318     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation -= m->tabs();
00319     append_scope_closer();
00320   }

00322   void Output::operator()(At_Rule* a)
00323   {
00324     string      kwd   = a->keyword();
00325     Selector*   s     = a->selector();
00326     Expression* v     = a->value();
00327     Block*      b     = a->block();
00328 
00329     append_indentation();
00330     append_token(kwd, a);
00331     if (s) {
00332       append_mandatory_space();
00333       in_wrapped = true;
00334       s->perform(this);
00335       in_wrapped = false;
00336     }
00337     else if (v) {
00338       append_mandatory_space();
00339       v->perform(this);
00340     }
00341     if (!b) {
00342       append_delimiter();
00343       return;
00344     }
00345 
00346     if (b->is_invisible() || b->length() == 0) {
00347       return append_string(" {}");
00348     }
00349 
00350     append_scope_opener();
00351 
00352     bool format = kwd != "@font-face";;
00353 
00354     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00355       Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00356       if (!stm->is_hoistable()) {
00357         stm->perform(this);
00358         if (i < L - 1 && format) append_special_linefeed();
00359       }
00360     }
00361 
00362     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00363       Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00364       if (stm->is_hoistable()) {
00365         stm->perform(this);
00366         if (i < L - 1 && format) append_special_linefeed();
00367       }
00368     }
00369 
00370     append_scope_closer();
00371   }
00372 
00373   void Output::operator()(String_Quoted* s)
00374   {
00375     if (s->quote_mark()) {
00376       append_token(quote(s->value(), s->quote_mark()), s);
00377     } else if (!in_comment) {
00378       append_token(string_to_output(s->value()), s);
00379     } else {
00380       append_token(s->value(), s);
00381     }
00382   }
00383 
00384   void Output::operator()(String_Constant* s)
00385   {
00386     if (String_Quoted* quoted = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00387       return Output::operator()(quoted);
00388     } else {
00389       string value(s->value());
00390       if (s->can_compress_whitespace() && output_style() == COMPRESSED) {
00391         value.erase(std::remove_if(value.begin(), value.end(), ::isspace), value.end());
00392       }
00393       if (!in_comment) {
00394         append_token(string_to_output(value), s);
00395       } else {
00396         append_token(value, s);
00397       }
00398     }
00399   }
